attributes.action: change the current political voting system to have a standardised test of maturity rather than the current age limit.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that many of the underage british public cannot vote when they reach maturity to decide for themselves to vote if they are still below eighteen. Equally people reach eighteen and older and still do not have the mentality to vote seriously.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
